sql.up: CREATE TABLE novels (id serial PRIMARY KEY, author varchar(255), average_rating numeric(3, 2), cover_image_url text, created_at timestamp DEFAULT current_timestamp, description text, is_featured boolean DEFAULT false, language varchar(50), novel_id int UNIQUE, slug varchar(255) UNIQUE, status varchar(50), title varchar(255) NOT NULL, updated_at timestamp DEFAULT current_timestamp, view_count int DEFAULT 0)
